[++Currency codes++]

[Add $100k when below $200k]
*citra_enabled
D3000000 00000000
38C71DC0 00030D40
D9000000 08C71DC0
D4000000 000186A0
D6000000 08C71DC0
D2000000 00000000
{Buy all the things and still get the satisfaction of racking up money!}

[99999 Pokemiles]
*citra_enabled
08C8B36C 0001869F

[65535 Ash in Soot Sack]
*citra_enabled
18C81B54 0000FFFF

[--]

[++Bike/etc. codes++]

[Always wearing Dowsing Machine]
08C6E888 0000000B
{Might crash the game certain areas. Change area or open bag to start effect.}

[Always riding Mach Bike]
08C6E888 00000001
{Might crash the game certain areas. Change area or open bag to start effect.}

[Always riding Acro Bike]
08C6E888 00000002
{Might crash the game certain areas. Change area or open bag to start effect.}

[--]

[Repel doesnt wear off (L+R to end)]
88C8546E FF000001
78C8546E FF0000FB
28C8546E 000000FA
DD000000 00000300
28C8546E 00000001
D2000000 00000000
{Might freeze GTS/WT. Turn this off when online. Use any repel to start/restart effect}

[1k+ secret base flags captured]
D3000000 00000000
38C8F3CC 000003E8
D9000000 08C8F3CC
D4000000 00000064
D6000000 08C8B3B0
DC000000 FFFFFFFC
D6000000 08C8F3CC
DC000000 FFFFFFFC
D6000000 08C8F3D0
D2000000 00000000
{You'll need to set a team name before you can raise your rank. Allows you to advance to Platinum rank all in one go once you reach Fortree}

[Quick egg hatch]
18C6F975 00000101
{Needs testing}

[++Nav-Dex Radar codes++]

[++Gender codes++]

[Radar Pokemon is Male, if possible]
D3000000 082C6C90
C0000000 0000000B
80000000 FF000000
70000000 FF000003
20000012 00000001
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000510
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Doesn't work on female-only or genderless species. Doesn't work on random/stationary encounters}

[Radar Pokemon is Female, if possible]
D3000000 082C6C90
C0000000 0000000B
80000000 FF000000
70000000 FF000003
20000012 00000002
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000510
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Doesn't work on male-only or genderless species. Doesn't work on random/stationary encounters}

D0000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000

[++Danger zone. These codes are NOT reccomended++]

80000000 FF000000
70000000 FF000003
10000002 00000130
D0000000 00000000

DC000000 00000510
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{WARNING: This code can generate illegal catch conditions. Do not trade the resulting pokemon. Doesn't work on random/stationary encounters}

*citra_enabled

0037A144 00000000

[Re-enable outlines (v.1.4)]
0037A140 BF800000
0037A144 3F800000
{Re-activates outlines after the above code}

[No outlines (v.1.0)]
00379EB4 00000000
00379EB8 00000000

[Re-enable outlines (v.1.0)]
00379EB4 BF800000
00379EB8 3F800000
{Re-activates outlines after the above code}
